item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8817)

summary.text: Hawaiian Sacred Sites Noise Reduction Act of 2006 - Amends the Wendell H. Ford Aviation Investment and Reform Act for the 21st Century to prohibit any commercial air tour operation from being conducted in airspace over: (1) the Kalaupapa National Historical Park; (2) the Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park; (2) the Pu`uhonua o Honaunau National Historical Park; or (4) the Pu`ukohola Heiau National Historic Site.

bill.title: Hawaiian Sacred Sites Noise Reduction Act of 2006

item.title: Hawaiian Sacred Sites Noise Reduction Act of 2006

A bill to prohibit commercial air tour operations over Kalaupapa National Historical Park, Kaloka-Honokohau Nationanal Historical Park, Pu'uhonua o Honaunau National Historical Part, and Pu'ukohola Heiau National Historic Site.
Hawaiian Sacred Sites Noise Reduction Act of 2006

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
